rooms.name: Mansion Entrance & Lobby
rooms.description: Spacious entry with reception area and waiting room.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open space connecting to dining and kitchen areas. South facing for natural sunlight as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Dining Hall
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with a view of the garden. North side placement considered.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen design with proper ventilation and exhaust system. East facing recommended for morning light as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Located on the west side to ensure privacy and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Spacious suite with ensuite bathroom. Placed in north-east direction for auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Shared facilities on ground floor for guests and service area.

rooms.name: Utility Room & Laundry
rooms.description: Service area with storage, washing machine, dryer, and other utilities.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Well-ventilated private gym space on the ground floor for fitness activities. Placed in south-west zone per Vastu.

openings.location: Adjacent to main entrance with natural lighting.
